c: ^Kay: Yeah, just had to deal with usual beratement from 'rents -
^Kay: I forgot to do the dishes so I'm a terrible person or some shit like that.
^Kay: Yeah, I just took my time getting here.
^Kay: I forget sometimes that this town is kinda pretty.
^Vanya: Yeah bt we've seen it all a million times. Does that mean it's still pretty?
^Kay: Yeah, not gonna lie I did not want to leave my room.
^Kay: I had a pretty perfect summer malaise going on; any longer and I was going to get eaten by the couch.
^Vanya: I get that! I've been watching "American Ninja Warrior" non-stop, just 'cos there's nothing else on.

g-0: ^Vanya: Over at the tower. Let's go see what's up.

All: ^Kay: Nothing much - What have you guys been up to?
^Halle: I watched "The Avengers" for the 18th time today - I'm convinced it's a film without flaws.
^Vanya: Oh yo so a guy came into the Gas N' Go today after filling up - bought a Snickers and a single lottery ticket, right?
^Vanya: He won ten grand and I wanted to suplex him for it SO BAD.
^Halle: You're too loud to be a fugitive.
^Kay: What would you do with the cash?
^Kay: If you won $10,000 right now, bam, in your wallet, no questions asked.
^Halle: Well first off, after taxes it's probably more like eight grand, so keep that in mind-
^Vanya: Booooo. Don't bring taxes into this. I have to do them myself this year it sucks.
^Halle: So given EIGHT grand what would you do?
^Halle: I'd invest it - it's not much but it'd become something by the time I'm like, forty.
^Kay: New phone, new clothes, laptop, bass guitar. All the essentials.
^Vanya: I don't have a bank account, so I'd stuff it into my mattress and never tell my parents.
^Halle: How the hell do you still not have a bank account?
^Vanya: Hey I don't wanna deal with that. I get paid in cash and it goes under my sleeping butt where it belongs.
^Halle: Okay what about a MILLION dollars-
^Kay: Your mattress would be very lumpy and I don't know how you'd hide that from your parents.
^Vanya: My mattress is full of LIES.
^Kay: I dunno man, there isn't really space for big dreams nowadays.
^Vanya: I try not to think about that stuff.
^Kay: Let's get out of here. This shit's too picturesque I'm not a fan.
